summary: AN ORDINANCE concerning certain compensation provisions, including certain shift-differential pay provisions for specified Seattle City Light employees, as a result of the settlement in Public Employment Relations Commission Cause No. 13351-U-97-3258 (International Brotherhood of Electrical Workers Local 77 v. City of Seattle); authorizing the executive to sign a memorandum of agreement implementing a part of such settlement; ratifying prior acts consistent with this ordinance; and providing payment therefor.
